mapper.select: SELECT c.ID, TITLE, CONTENT, "START", c.STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, s.PHONE, s.NAME FROM CALENDAR c JOIN STUDENT s ON c.STUDENT_ID = s.ID WHERE c.CALENDAR_ID ='1' ORDER BY "START" DESC

SELECT c.ID, TITLE, CONTENT, "START", c.STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, s.PHONE, s.NAME FROM CALENDAR c JOIN STUDENT s ON c.STUDENT_ID = s.ID WHERE c.CALENDAR_ID ='1' AND (s.ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR s.NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY "START" DESC

SELECT ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK FROM CALENDAR WHERE (TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY "START" DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK) VALUES(#{id}, '1', #{title}, #{content}, 'time', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"')+1/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"')-1/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{student_id}, #{meet_id}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK FROM CALENDAR WHERE CALENDAR_ID = '1' ORDER BY "START" DESC

SELECT c.ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, c.STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK, s.PHONE, s.NAME FROM CALENDAR c JOIN STUDENT s ON c.STUDENT_ID = s.ID WHERE c.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, "START"=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), "END"=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+ 1/24,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), ALARM_DATE=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')- 1/(24),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), MEET_ID=#{meet_id} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK) VALUES(#{id}, #{calendar_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS".""000Z"')- 1/(24),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{student_id}, '', 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CALENDAR_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, "START", "END", ALARM_DATE, STUDENT_ID, MEET_ID, ALARM_CHECK FROM CALENDAR ORDER BY "START" DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CALENDAR SET CALENDAR_ID=#{calendar_id}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, CATEGORY=#{category}, "START"=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), "END"=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{end},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), ALARM_DATE=TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')- 1/(24),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE ID=#{id}
